events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product is not what I expected. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been classified under the refund category based on the customer's request for a return and refund.
Customer support agent Maria has been assigned to handle the refund case for this customer inquiry.
Hello! I’m Maria from customer support. I understand you want a refund. I’m here to assist you with the return process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return to help us process your refund faster?
Sure, my order number is 54321XYZ. The product did not match the description on your website, so I’d like to return it.
Thank you for the details. I’ve initiated the return process for you. Please ship the product back using the prepaid label we will email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate that you are sending a prepaid label for the return shipment.
We have received your returned item and processed the full refund to your original payment method. You should see it reflected soon.
Just following up to ensure that you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with, please let us know.
This refund case is now closed. Thank you for contacting support, and we hope to serve you better in the future.
